metadata.Description: Electricity generated by the force of falling or flowing water, typically from a dam or a river.

level 1.Description: Hydroelectricity implements the Hydropower Policy by promoting the development and utilization of hydropower resources.
Hydroelectricity funds infrastructure projects to support the construction and maintenance of hydropower plants.
Hydroelectricity focuses on river basin management to ensure sustainable water resource utilization for hydropower generation.
Hydroelectricity plays a role in the renewable energy transition by providing a reliable and renewable source of electricity.
Hydroelectricity partners with local communities to ensure their participation and benefit sharing in hydropower projects.
Hydroelectricity contributes to sustainable development by providing clean and renewable energy for economic growth and poverty reduction.
Hydroelectricity monitors hydropower generation to ensure efficient and sustainable utilization of hydropower resources.
Hydroelectricity targets electrification by providing reliable and affordable electricity to remote and rural areas through hydropower projects.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

level 2.Subject: Electrification Planning
level 2.Description: Electrification Planning implements the Energy Access Initiative to provide electricity to remote and underserved areas.

level 2.Subject: Electrification Planning
level 2.Description: Electrification Planning funds renewable energy projects to promote the use of clean and sustainable energy sources.

level 2.Subject: electrification planning
level 2.Description: Electrification planning implements sustainable energy projects to ensure access to clean and reliable electricity.

level 2.Subject: electrification planning
level 2.Description: Electrification planning funds renewable energy initiatives to promote the adoption of clean energy sources.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 3.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 3.Subject: energy poverty indices
level 3.Description: Energy poverty indices implement energy access programs to provide affordable and reliable energy services to underserved communities.

level 3.Subject: energy markets
level 3.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.
